message: I'm pretty sure everyone who planned on eating has eaten now. How are we all doing?
It would have been nice to have Sebastien or Kat out to help out with WP
I got my user creation working how I want.  Deciding whether I want to auto login them or not.....
I made the "you're about to get charged some more money" page for the part of my app that actually costs money: http://d.pr/HHf2

@Slhomme Not sure if you can do much remotely, since it seems to be an install bug and I am much too lazy to go figure it out. Thanks for the offer though! Oh and the rest of my frustrations have to do with the specific theme I am using :) 

But this is a good way to learn!
@Abdullah Hey - maybe I could help remotely with this WP thing  :) I wish I was there today but I have some friends (from France!) visiting us the whole weekend.

Check out this new neat feature from Paypal... no need to have website payments pro anymore... you can accept credit cards for recurring payments w/o needing a paypal account.. https://www.paypal.com/ca/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=xpt/Marketing/merchant/ERPOverview

No pbm :) Good luck with the project then...looking foarwrd to see what you come up with.

Cheers
I may be late to the game..but wufoo is awesome.
@slhomme still working on it but http://www.wordpressedmonton.com
It is SO hard today to not try to build everything perfectly the first time.
I am going to fix the contrast issues once the content + layout is done. I hate these low contrast themes.
@girasquid When you have a sec can I show you this paypal screen I'm looking at? They look like they added a recurring payments option.  Looks pretty neat.
Cool, definitely coming along. Is the subtext supposed to be so low contrast? http://d.pr/anpO
Thanks to some help from Greg, I just polished off my SSO debugger: http://d.pr/pVuK
Didn't get to mark even one check-box on my list, but i still feel like I accomplished a lot. We should do this more often.
